moduleDescription: Base classes and APIs for all SQL support for JK applications.

entities.name: SQLResultSetSingleColumnIterator
entities.description: A generic iterator that iterater a single column in a result set.

entities.name: SQLTableColumnIndexInfo
entities.description: Information about column indexes of an SQL table.

entities.name: SQLResultSetIterator
entities.description: A generic iterator for SQL result sets.

entities.name: SQLOrderingRule
entities.description: Representation of an ordering rule in SQL.

entities.name: SQLTableColumnInfo
entities.description: Information about columns of an SQL table.

entities.name: SQLDatabase
entities.description:
SQL database connection. This is the base class and abstraction for all
database-specific driver classes.

entities.name: SQLStatement
entities.description: Represents an SQL statement or query
